articles.title: Asian Champions Trophy Hockey: India lose 3-5 to Japan in semis, to play Pakistan in bronze medal clash - Times of India
articles.description: Hockey News: Defending champions and Olympic bronze medallist India dished out a below-par performance to suffer a stunning 3-5 defeat against Japan in the second
articles.content:
A close encounter but not the result we wanted! A look at Team 's Semi-Final clash of the Hero Mens Champions https://t.co/E6jqGAyTyC

articles.title: Resident escapes Yishun flat's fire by jumping out of window - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - A man in his 30s leapt out of his second-storey flat in Yishun to escape a fire on Sunday afternoon (Dec 19). A cleaner from Bangladesh, Mr Hamid, who goes by one name, told The Straits Times he had tried to break the man's fall with a discarded s…
